verses.name: Numbers 32:24
verses.text: Build you cities for your little ones, and folds for your sheep; and do that which hath proceeded out of your mouth.

verses.name: Numbers 32:25
verses.text: And the children of Gad and the children of Reuben spake unto Moses, saying, Thy servants will do as my lord commandeth.

verses.name: Numbers 32:26
verses.text: Our little ones, our wives, our flocks, and all our cattle, shall be there in the cities of Gilead:

verses.name: Numbers 32:27
verses.text: But thy servants will pass over, every man armed for war, before the Lord to battle, as my lord saith.
